Abine: The Online Privacy Company | Part-Time Software Engineers | Boston, MA | Remote OK | https://www.abine.com/index.html

Abine is a pure-play consumer online privacy company with millions of global registered users. We are profitable and are looking to slowly build our team with skilled developers that have real longstanding interest in the work we do. We care more about alignment and less about where you are located.

Our stack is AWS Ruby and Node - Javascript browser extensions coupled with Android and iOS mobile client apps.

Application process is a quick survey, live conversation, and usually a short paid project after that. jobs at getabine dotcom (no recruiters ever, thanks)
